author: Special Correspondent
title: Coronavirus lockdown | Congress seeks more financial aid for State govts
description: Rahul asks govt to scale up testing rather than ‘lighting lamps’.
content: The Congress on Saturday said the Union government should empower the State governments by announcing a special economic package of 1 lakh crore and release about Rs. 42,000 crore due as compensation for the goods and services tax (GST). It urged the Reserve … [+3430 chars]
